titleStmt.title: The vvoman in the moone As it was presented before her Highnesse. By Iohn Lyllie maister of Artes.
titleStmt.author: Lyly, John, 1554?-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By G. Simson] for William Iones, and are to be sold at the signe of the Gun, neere Holburne Conduict,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Gun, neere Holburne Conduict
